title: 82. Validating Narcissistic Abuse
description:
Hey sis!

In this episode, we are talking all about validating narcissistic abuse. Yes, we are getting raw & real with narcissistic abuse in childhood, validating your truth, and understanding the magnitude of what you have been through. Tune in to hear more!

Click here to join my 4 month group coaching program, Embodied. Spots are limited- I will only have 10 spots available for this container to keep it as close knit as possible. or visit Beatricekamau.com/groupcoaching

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
